identified-content.person: PORTER, DR. MARGARET LOUISE (DR. MARGARET LOUISE BOND)

block.p: Dr. Margaret Louise Porter, the daughter of Dr. and Mrs. John Porter of Pound Ridge, N.Y., was married yesterday to William Edward Bond Jr., a son of Mr. and Mrs. Bond of Rochester. The Rev. Daniel Wehmeier officiated at Immanuel Lutheran Church in Danbury, Conn., with the Rev. James Higgins, a Roman Catholic priest, taking part.

Dr. Bond, 29, graduated from Yale University and recently received an M.D. from Columbia University. She is to become an intern in internal medicine at New York Presbyterian Hospital this month. Her father retired as director of university relations for I.B.M. in Armonk, N.Y. Her mother, Elizabeth Porter, is a piano instructor in Pound Ridge.

Daniel Wehmeier officiated at Immanuel Lutheran Church in Danbury, Conn., with the Rev. James Higgins, a Roman Catholic priest, taking part.

Dr. Bond, 29, graduated from Yale University and recently received an M.D. from Columbia University. She is to become an intern in internal medicine at New York Presbyterian Hospital this month. Her father retired as director of university relations for I.B.M. in Armonk, N.Y. Her mother, Elizabeth Porter, is a piano instructor in Pound Ridge.

Mr. Bond, 30, is a project manager in New York at Radnet, which provides software and consultation to businesses collaborating with other businesses on the Internet. He graduated from Bucknell University and received a master's degree in computer science from the Rochester Institute of Technology. His mother, Lynda Bond, is a real estate agent at Century 21 Red Coach Realty in Pittsford, N.Y. His father is a consultant on the commercialization of Internet security technologies in Pittsford.
